channel.title: Creating Thumbnails
channel.description:
I've been looking around at sources to create thumbnails, but when I try to use _any_ of them on an image, it says that the width and height are -1. Different examples have been using Image objects that get their initialization from Tookit and ImageIcon objects.
Does anyone know what the possible problem could be?

item.title: Creating Thumbnails
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

well you know ImageIcon implements that interface Icon, which has methods like getIconWidth and getIconHeight, i think they work, cause i once had this problem of image.getWidth() returning -1
if that doesnt work, try using the getWidth with the ImageConsumer parameter (JComponent implements ImageConsumer, so just put one of that)

Read full topic

item.title: Creating Thumbnails
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Well, it worked for an image, then, yano, stopped working.

lawl pasted this:
http://schmidt.devlib.org/java/save-jpeg-thumbnail.html

And I found another one on the Java forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating Thumbnails
item.dc:creator: @_cake _cake
item.description:
@_cake wrote:

No idea, unless you post a source for one that says they’re -1.

Read full topic
